ʻohana.definition: Hawaiian word meaning family in the [extended] sense. Popularized outside of [the State] of Hawaii by the Disney animated film and [franchise] Lilo & Stitch, which uses the concept of extended families as its main theme through this word.
ʻohana.example: ʻOhana means family. Family means nobody gets [left behind] — or [forgotten]. —Lilo [Pelekai]
